thread.title: Kotoko new signing Ernest Sowah aims at No.1 spot
thread.title_full: Kotoko new signing Ernest Sowah aims at No.1 spot

title: Kotoko new signing Ernest Sowah aims at No.1 spot
text:
17:25 CET Kotoko new signing Ernest Sowah aims at No.1 spot - www.ghanasoccernet.com Ernest Sowah 
Goalkeeper Ernest Sowah says he will be Asante Kotoko's first choice goalkeeper after signing a three-year deal with the Porcupine Warriors. 
The Ghana international faces from last season's number one Eric Ofori Antwi, Joseph Addo and Felix Annan who will return on loan from WAFA SC. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
